title: Stylish Mauritius Escape with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Activities
description: Discover the beauty of Mauritius on an exotic getaway at the contemporary Long Beach Resort. Located in the east of the island, the resort benefits from a private stretch of the beautiful Belle Mare Beach. Make the most of this luxury resort's unlimited complimentary activities, with yoga and watersports on the menu, and relax with fantastic inclusions such as daily breakfast, nightly dinner with drinks and more. Two children (aged 11 and under) stay free of charge with full inclusions.

title: Adults-Only, All-Inclusive Indulgence in Tropical Mauritius
description: Discover the beauty of Mauritius on an exotic getaway at Ambre, A Sun Resort, an adults-only oasis located in the east of the island offering unparalleled ocean views, outstanding facilities and stylish accommodation. No need to worry about a thing with all-inclusive dining and drinks, complimentary non-motorised watersport equipment and a daily MUR750 credit (approx. A$30) spa credit per person.
offer_address: Coastal Road Palmar, Belle Mare 41604, Mauritius

title: Stylish Mauritius Escape with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Dinner
description: Discover the beauty of Mauritius on an exotic getaway at the stylish and modern Long Beach Resort. Located in the east of the island, the resort boasts a private stretch of the beautiful Belle Mare Beach, where you can make the most of this luxury resort's huge range of activities and gourmet dining destinations. A private arrival transfer from the airport is included, plus daily buffet breakfast, nightly dinner (your choice of buffet or three-course à la carte) with one drink per person every evening and 20% off all treatments at the on-site spa retreat. Whisk the whole family away, with two children aged 11 years and under staying free of charge, with meals and complimentary Kids’ Club activities.

title: Award-Winning Five-Star Mauritius Suites
description:
Tropical island chic has a new name: Long Beach Mauritius. Perched on the blonde sands of Belle Mare on the African island’s east coast, the contemporary five-star resort delivers equal measures of relaxation and recreation across 60 acres of tropical gardens. With a colourful coral reef and picturesque beach as a backdrop and five-star facilities as standard, it caters to every type of adventure.

You’ll be spoilt for choice at every turn at Long Beach Mauritius, with five restaurants, four pools, countless leisure activities and a serene, European-inspired spa at your fingertips. Design each day as you please: take to the water for snorkelling, windsurfing or kayaking, or work up a sweat at the state-of-the-art gym, tennis or badminton courts. Keen golfers can tee off at Ill aux Cerfs, an 18-hole panoramic course, or work their way through the green of Anahita, designed by former world number one player, Ernie Els. Long Beach isn’t just a playground for the adults: art and DJ classes involve the whole family, while Sun Kids club is home to indoor and outdoor play areas, a kids’ pool and a jam-packed program of painting, yoga, cooking classes and more. Alfresco dining is the cherry on top: every evening, take your pick of Italian, Japanese, Asian or international show kitchens, placed around the central piazza.

title: Adults-Only Mauritius Beachfront Retreat with Ocean-View Infinity Pool Opposite Coral Reef Lagoon
description:
Hidden within a sheltered bay along Mauritius’ east coast, Ambre, A Sun Resort, Mauritius offers adults-only (16+) seclusion and tranquility against the breathtaking backdrop of Belle Mare Beach’s cerulean waters and naturally protected coral reef.

There are no limits to how you can spend your time at this beachfront retreat. Float away in the infinity pool overlooking the Indian Ocean, find your flow with beachfront yoga, unwind with a massage in the spa pavilion, dine across three restaurants and two bars, and explore vibrant marine life in the adjacent turquoise lagoon. This is the ideal place to head out and explore the likes of Ile aux Cerfs (at cost)  - an emerald island and golfers' paradise with two private beaches - before returning to the privacy of this sheltered oasis, complete with its own nightclub
offer_address: Coastal Road Palmar, Belle Mare 41604, Mauritius

title: Mauritius One&Only Beachfront Luxury with Poolside Cabanas & World-Class Spa
description: Set along a gleaming stretch of private coastline on Belle Mare's peninsula is the five-star One&Only Le Saint Géran, the island's first-ever luxury hotel that set the standard for barefoot bliss in Mauritius. With One&Only's signature bespoke service and exquisite dining in one of the world's dreamiest locations, this is a true tropical paradise. Spend blissful days kayaking, snorkeling in the sheltered private lagoon, dining at the new Le Badamier al fresco restaurant (or any of the other five exquisite restaurants), or simply lounging in a cabana poolside. For utter indulgence, the One&Only Spa is heaven on Earth for bespoke treatments and head-to-toe pampering.
